description: Spicy and savory roasted red pepper hummus! Perfect for a dip, or to fill a sandwich or wrap.
keywords: red pepper hummus, roasted red pepper hummus
name: 6 Ingredient 5 Minute Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces roasted red peppers packed in water
1/2 to 1 teaspoon of chipotle pepper powder

recipeInstructions.text: Note: Keep the juice/aquafaba from the chickpeas. It makes an excellent egg replacer. Store it in an air tight container in the refrigerator or the freezer.
Drain and rinse the chickpeas and put them in the food processor.
Add the roasted red pepper. Do NOT add the water from the jar.
Squeeze the lemon juice in the processor. Use a strainer so the seeds donâ€™t fall into the processor.
Add the cilantro leaves (not the stems), cumin, chipotle pepper, salt, and black pepper.
Process the ingredients until the hummus is smooth and creamy.
Serve with warm pita chips, sliced vegetables, or tortilla chips.
